title: Did Ein Rand receive social security benefits?
subtitle: The writer "Atlas Schroed" called government charity "moral," but there is evidence that she has accepted social security benefits in her recent years - and that it was consistent with her view of the world to do so.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Although government benefits are said to constitute an unethical redistribution of wealth, Ein Rand received social security payments later in life.
